Sofia Hernandez Salazar (amụrụ n'Ọgọst 26, 1998) bụ onye Costa Rica na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, na onye na-ahụ Maka gburugburu ebe obibi.
Sofía bụ nwa akwụkwọ sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Costa Rica
Ọ bụ onye nhazi maka Fridays For Future Costa Rica, onye nhazi nke Escazú Ahora Costa Rica na Young Leaders Costa Rica ma soro guzobe Latinas For Climate
Ọ gara 2019 United Nations Climate Change Conference dị ka akụkụ nke ndị nnọchi anya Costa Rican.

Ọ sonyeere Friday For Future Costa Rica n'etiti afọ 2019 ma n'otu n'ime ọgbaghara mbụ ya n'ihu ụlọ onye isi ala ọ bụ akụkụ nke mkparịta ụka ya na onye isi ala nke mba ahụ, Carlos Alvarado, na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe gbasara mkpa ọ dị ikwupụta ọnọdụ mberede ihu igwe na inye ndị ntorobịa ezigbo ihe na ọnọdụ ihu igwe na gburugburu ebe obibi. N'ikpeazụ, Sofia esorowo ndị ịsị mba Costa Rica kwuo okwu, ọkachasị osote onye isi ala, Epsy Campbell, ebe o kwụsịrị ike maka mkpa ọ dị ịkwado nkwekọrịta Escazú na osote minista nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mkparịta ụka ụmụ amaala banyere mkpa ọ dị iwepụ iwu ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri.

Kemgbe Septemba 2020 ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nhazi nke Escazú Now, atụmatụ nke Fridays For Future Costa Rica, Greenwolf Costa Rica na Youth and Climate Change Network nke na-ezube ịkwalite nkwado na mmejuputa nkwekọrịta Escazú n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị na mba ahụ.

N'ọnwa Disemba 2020, Hernández so n'otu ìgwè zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ụmụ nwanyị itoolu na ndị na-abụghị ndị na-eme ihe ike nke bipụtara akwụkwọ ozi nye ndị isi ụwa na Thomson Reuters Foundation News, nke isiokwu ya bụ "Dị ka nkwekọrịta Paris maka mgbanwe ihu igwe na-egosi afọ ise, a chọrọ ime ihe ngwa ngwa maka egwu ihu igwe ugbu a"

Ndị otu mba ụwa gụnyere Mitzi Jonelle Tan, Belyndar Rikimani, Leonie Bremer, Laura Muñoz, Fatou Jeng, Disha Ravi, Hilda Flavia Nakabuye na Saoi O'Connor. O nyere aka ịhazi Mock COP26 ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Costa Rica.
